title: Celebrities Becoming Cigar-lebrities
itunes:title: Celebrities Becoming Cigar-lebrities
description:
Today on The Cigar Authority, we talk about celebrities who’ve tried their hand in the cigar industry during the first hour of the show. We will light up the Pulita 60th Anniversary which is part of this months Care Package. There’s another celebrity up to bat who is about to release a brand of his own.

During the second hour, we will smoke on the blind once again with an unknown cigar from Cigar Journal Magazine.

Join us for all the madness on this weeks episode of The Cigar Authority!
